means: 不受欢迎的，令人失望的，令人讨厌的

sentence.Network_en: The media has brought more unwelcome attention to the Royal Family.
sentence.Network_cn: 媒体对王室的过度关注令人反感。

sentence.Network_en: She was, quite deliberately, making him feel unwelcome.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是有意让他觉得自己不受欢迎。

sentence.Network_en: A colleague made unwelcome sexual advances towards her.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个同事对她进行性骚扰。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... unfriendly 不友善的 unwelcome 不受欢迎的 unfortunate 不幸的.
『凡任何不受欢迎(unwelcome)的性接近、性要求，或其他具有性意味的言语或身体行为，都称为性骚扰。』本席希望性别平等教育课 …
第19章... ... reluctance n.不愿；勉强六级词汇 unwelcome a.不受欢迎的 n.冷淡六级词汇 cheerfulness n.高兴，愉快六级词汇.

list.abs: I underwent chemotherapy in 1999 and again in 2004 , thanks a profoundly unwelcome recurrence .我于1999年接受了化疗，拜令人厌恶的复发所赐，于2004年再次接受化疗。
He brought unwelcome news ., 他带来了不好的消息.
no doubt that we were unwelcome visitors ., 毫无疑问 , 我们的来访是不受欢迎的.
he went rather than stay as an unwelcome guest ., 他走了 , 不愿留下来做个不受欢迎的客人.

entry.tran: 不受欢迎的；不想要的；讨人嫌的
entry.def: An unwelcome experience is one that you do not like and did not want.

example.ex: The media has brought more unwelcome attention to the Royal Family...
example.tran: 媒体对王室的过度关注令人反感。

example.ex: A colleague made unwelcome sexual advances towards her.
example.tran: 一个同事对她进行性骚扰。

entry.def: If you say that a visitor is unwelcome, you mean that you did not want them to come.

example.ex: She was, quite deliberately, making him feel unwelcome.
example.tran: 她是有意让他觉得自己不受欢迎。

means.word_mean: 1. not welcome; not giving pleasure or received with pleasure;

auth_sentence.content: When emotions are raw, such attention is often unwelcome.

means.word_mean: 不受欢迎的, 令人失望的, 令人讨厌的

sentences.en: I felt that we were unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们是不受欢迎的。
狗能够阻拦不受欢迎的闯入者。

sentences.en: He parried the unwelcome question very skilfully.
sentences.cn: 他很巧妙地避开了那个不受欢迎的问题。

sentences.en: He was pleased to be able to fling off such an unwelcome responsibility.
sentences.cn: 能摆脱如此令人厌烦的责任他感到很高兴。
